Title: A native HTML4 / HTML5 Remote Desktop Protocol client
Description: Myrtille is a simple way to connect remote desktops from a web browser, without any plugin, extension or configuration.
HomeWiki:
Myrtille is a simple way to connect remote desktops and applications from a web browser, without any plugin, extension or configuration.

For the end user, there is just need for a browser. Server side, it uses the .NET (C#) framework and the RDP protocol through an HTTP(S) gateway.

It features HTML4 and HTML5, file transfer and WebP compression.

Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l4CL8h0KfQ8
Website: http://cedrozor.github.io/myrtille
Repository: https://github.com/cedrozor/myrtille
TagList: remote control,HTML5,HTML4,freerdp,remote desktop,remote connect,remote access,open source,
